name: Falling town
description:
Help us, and vote after playing the game here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/falling-town

Your town is located on a island in the middle of the ocean, it’s up to you to build it, and making sure it doesn’t get destroyed. Each night a comet strike and destroy some of your island’s tiles. The game is a little bit luck based, but there are some interresting features that will make or break your town. There is 8 different buildings with different mechanics. Your objective is to survive as many days as possible. If your townhall gets destroyed you lose, or if your power goes below 0 you lose.

Our website
